bug.author: leemgs
bug.description:
It is strange. It seems that enabling /dev/video0 (device node) is not stable. As we all know, the device node is used by PR-checker/apptest when a PR is submitted by a contributor.
Frequency: sometimes
Nov-05-2018: @leemgs found the issue by running "$ dmesg" command. At that time, I could not find /dev/video0 file at 15:00 Nov-05-2018 even though PRs are submitted beforehand.
How to reproduce:
Run the below scripts. Then you can check a created time of /dev/video* file.
ubuntu@ip-172-31-27-164:~$ while true; do ls -al /dev/video*; sleep 5; clear; done
